entry.title: Development Roadmap of Bitcoin Core 0.9.2
entry.summary: The developers of Bitcoin Core plan to release version 0.9.2 with a focus on bug fixes and translation updates. The development roadmap for this release includes a feature and string freeze that will begin in three weeks from the date of the announcement, as shared by Warren Togami Jr. on April 22, 2014. Wladimir acknowledged the announcement and thanked Warren for writing it.
